chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Type) (x k : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), length e = k -> length (raw_insert x o e) = mymax (1 + k) (1 + x)

Premises:
env = fun A : Type => list (option A) : Type -> Type Arguments env _%type_scope
mymax = fun m n : nat => if le_gt_dec m n then n else m : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments mymax (_ _)%nat_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.D {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.N {TA TX
raw_insert : forall A : Type, nat -> option A -> env A -> env A
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
insert_insert : forall (A : Type) (k s : nat) (a b : option A) (e : env A), k <= s -> raw_insert k a (raw_insert s b e) = raw_insert (1 + s) b (raw_insert k a e)
lookup_shift_insert : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), lookup (shift y x) (raw_insert y o e) = lookup x e
lookup_insert_bingo : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), x = y -> lookup x (raw_insert y o e) = o
raw_insert_successor : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), raw_insert (S x) o e = lookup 0 e :: raw_insert x o (tl e)
lookup_insert_recent : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), x < y -> lookup x (raw_insert y o e) = lookup x e
lookup_insert_old : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), x > y -> lookup x (raw_insert y o e) = lookup (x - 1) e
defined_implies_below_length : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (x k : nat) (a : A), length e <= k -> lookup x e = Some a -> x < k
raw_insert_zero : forall (A : Type) (o : option A) (e : env A), raw_insert 0 o e = o :: e
fold_insert : forall (A B : Type) (f : option A -> B -> B) (o : option A) (e : env A) (accu : B), fold f (raw_insert 0 o e) accu = f o (fold f e accu)
empty_eq_insert : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (o : A) (e : env A), empty A = insert x o e -> False
insert_insert_always : forall (A : Type) (k s : nat) (a b : option A) (e : env A), raw_insert k a (raw_insert s b e) = raw_insert (shift k s) b (raw_insert (if le_gt_dec k s then k else k - 1) a e)
closed_increment : LiftLift -> forall k t : nat, closed k t -> closed (1 + k) t
lookup_successor : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (e : env A), lookup (S x) e = lookup x (tl e)
fold_invariant : forall (A B : Type) (P : env A -> B -> Prop) (f : option A -> B -> B) (accu : B), P (empty A) accu -> (forall (o : option A) (e : env A) (accu0 : B), P e accu0 -> P (raw_insert 0 o e) (f o accu0)) -> forall e : env A, P e (fold f e accu)
lookup_beyond_length : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (x : nat), length e <= x -> lookup x e = None
translate_lift : forall w x y z : nat, lift w x y = z -> forall k : nat, lift w (k + x) (k + y) = k + z
map_map_vanish : forall (A B : Type) (f : B -> A) (g : A -> B) (e : env A), (forall x : A, f (g x) = x) -> map f (map g e) = e
map_raw_insert : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : nat) (e : env A), map f (raw_insert x None e) = raw_insert x None (map f e)
lookup_map_none : forall (A B : Type) (x : nat) (e : env A) (f : A -> B), lookup x e = None -> lookup x (map f e) = None
map_lift_map_lift : forall (T : Type) (k s wk ws : nat) (e : env T) (H : Lift T), LiftLift -> k <= s -> map (lift wk k) (map (lift ws s) e) = map (lift ws (wk + s)) (map (lift wk k) e)
insert_nil : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A), insert x a e = nil -> False
lookup_map_some : forall (A B : Type) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A) (f : A -> B), lookup x e = Some a -> lookup x (map f e) = Some (f a)
pun_pun : forall (v : ?V) (w k : nat) (t : ?T), subst v (w + k) (lift w k t) = subst v k (lift w (1 + k) t) where ?V : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Var ?V] ?T : [ |- Type] ?H0 : [ |- Lift ?T] ?H1 : [ |- Subst ?V ?T] ?PunPun : [ |- PunPun]
lift_idx_old : forall w k x : nat, k <= x -> lift w k x = w + x
Record PunPun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_PunPun { pun_pun : forall (v : V) (w k : nat) (t : T), subst v (w + k) (lift w k t) = subst v k (lift w (1 + k) t) } Arguments PunPun {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} Arguments Build_PunPun [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
map_insert : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A), map f (insert x a e) = insert x (f a) (map f e)
map_insert_eq : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : nat) (a : A) (b : B) (e : env A), f a = b -> map f (insert x a e) = insert x b (map f e)
lookup_map_some_reverse : forall (A B : Type) (x : nat) (b : B) (e : env A) (f : A -> B), lookup x (map f e) = Some b -> exists a : A, lookup x e = Some a /\ b = f a
lift_subst_2 : forall (t : ?T) (k : nat) (v : ?V) (s w : nat), s <= k -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) s (lift w (1 + k) t) where ?V : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Lift ?V] ?T : [ |- Type] ?H0 : [ |- Lift ?T] ?H1 : [ |- Subst ?V ?T] ?LiftSubst2 : [ |- LiftSubst2]
fold_left_length : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), fold_left (fun (x : nat) (_ : A) => S x) l 0 = length l
length_monotonic : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (k1 k2 : nat), length e <= k1 -> k1 <= k2 -> length e <= k2
lift_subst : forall (t : ?T) (k : nat) (v : ?V) (s w : nat), lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (lift w (1 + k) s) (lift w (shift s k) t) where ?V : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Lift ?V] ?T : [ |- Type] ?H0 : [ |- Lift ?T] ?H1 : [ |- Subst ?V ?T] ?LiftSubst : [ |- LiftSubst]
Record LiftSubst2 (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_LiftSubst2 { lift_subst_2 : forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), s <= k -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) s (lift w (1 + k) t) } Arguments LiftSubst2 {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} Arguments Build_LiftSubst2 [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
lift_idx_recent : forall w k x : nat, k > x -> lift w k x = x
subst_subst : forall (t : ?T) (k : nat) (v : ?V) (s : nat) (w : ?V), k <= s -> subst v s (subst w k t) = subst (subst v s w) k (subst (shift k v) (1 + s) t) where ?V : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Lift ?V] ?H0 : [ |- Subst ?V ?V] ?T : [ |- Type] ?H1 : [ |- Subst ?V ?T] ?SubstSubst : [ |- SubstSubst]
partition_length : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l l1 l2 : list A), partition f l = (l1, l2) -> length l = length l1 + length l2
Record LiftSubst (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_LiftSubst { lift_subst : forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (lift w (1 + k) s) (lift w (shift s k) t) } Arguments LiftSubst {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} Arguments Build_LiftSubst [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
insert_eq_insert_1 : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (a1 a2 : A) (e1 e2 : env A), insert x a1 e1 = insert x a2 e2 -> a1 = a2
Record SubstSubst (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (H0 : Subst V V) (T : Type) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_SubstSubst { subst_subst : forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s : nat) (w : V), k <= s -> subst v s (subst w k t) = subst (subst v s w) k (subst (shift k v) (1 + s) t) } Arguments SubstSubst {V}%type_scope {H H0} {T}%type_scope {H1} Arguments Build_SubstSubst [V]%type_scope _ _ [T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
app_length : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A), length (l ++ l') = length l + length l'

```coq
intros A x k o e H. unfold raw_insert, mymax, env in *. rewrite H. destruct le_gt_dec; auto.
Qed.```
